trans-unit.source: Extends design-time behavior for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Content" /> Web server control.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ContentDesigner" /> class.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> object for this designer.
The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: 與這個設計工具相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ContentDesigner> objects add <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> elements to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Content> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ContentDesigner> 物件會將加入<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem>項目<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Content>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control can be resized on the visual designer surface.
<see langword="true" /> if the control can be resized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果控制項可以調整大小;否則， <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection" /> associated with the design-time markup generated by <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ContentDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml(System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection)" />.
Gets the markup that is used to represent the control at design time from the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection" /> object.
The markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
The markup generated by <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ContentDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> includes region identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 所產生的標記<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ContentDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>包含區域識別項。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ContentDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> should add <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> elements to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection> specified by the `regions` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ContentDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> 應該加入<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>項目<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection>所指定`regions`參數。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> from which to get the content.
Gets the content of the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> object.
The persistence string for the content of the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" />.

If <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion> elements are defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection> and the design-time markup contains region identifiers, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ContentDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> method is used to return the content for each <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion> in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection>
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion>中所定義的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection>和設計階段標記包含地區識別碼<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ContentDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>方法用來傳回每一個內容<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion>中 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets the inner markup of the control.
The inner markup of the control.
A region is not a property of the control, so for persistent content, this method must return the inner HTML markup of the control.
trans-unit.target: 區域不是屬性的控制項，因此為了保存內容，這個方法必須傳回控制項的內部 HTML 標記。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> objects that represent the properties of the class of the component.
The keys in the dictionary of properties are property names.
When overridden in a derived class, allows a designer to change or remove items from the set of properties that it exposes through a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor" /> object.
This method provides a way to change or remove items within the dictionary of properties that are exposed through a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可用來變更或移除的公開會透過屬性字典中的項目<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>。

trans-unit.source: The keys in the dictionary of properties are the names of the properties.
trans-unit.target: 屬性字典中的索引鍵是屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The objects are of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 物件是類型<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>。

trans-unit.source: In this overridden method, the designer clears all properties except <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Content.ContentPlaceHolderID%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ID%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫方法中，設計工具會清除所有的屬性，除了<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Content.ContentPlaceHolderID%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ID%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You can directly filter the dictionary that is accessible through the <paramref name="properties" /> parameter, or you can leave it unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 您可以直接篩選字典可透過存取<paramref name="properties" />參數，或者您可以將它保留不變。

trans-unit.source: If you are overriding this method, call the base implementation after you perform your own filtering.
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在覆寫這個方法，請執行您自己的篩選之後呼叫的基底實作。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor" /> objects that represent the events of the class of the component.
The keys in the dictionary of events are event names.
When overridden in a derived class, allows a designer to add items to the set of events that it exposes through a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor" /> object.
This method provides a way to add items to the dictionary of events that a designer exposes through a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可用來將項目加入至設計工具會透過公開的事件字典<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>。

trans-unit.source: The keys in the dictionary of events are the names of the events.
trans-unit.target: 中的事件字典的索引鍵是事件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The objects are of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 物件是類型<xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor>。

trans-unit.source: In this overridden method, the designer clears all events for this control.
trans-unit.target: 此覆寫的方法，在設計工具會清除對這個控制項的所有事件。

trans-unit.source: You can directly modify the dictionary that is accessible through the <paramref name="events" /> parameter, or you can leave it unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 您可以直接修改字典可透過存取<paramref name="events" />參數，或者您可以將它保留不變。

trans-unit.source: If you are overriding this method, call the base implementation before you perform your own filtering.
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在覆寫這個方法，呼叫基底實作，才能執行您自己的篩選。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> in which to set the content.
The persistence string for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> content.
Sets the content of the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> object.
Developers will typically persist the content to the control or property that represents the region.
trans-unit.target: 開發人員通常會保存的內容控制項或表示區域的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion> elements are defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection> and the design-time markup contains region identifiers, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ContentDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> method is used to set the content for each <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion> in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion>中所定義的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection>和設計階段標記包含地區識別碼<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ContentDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>方法用來設定每個內容<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion>中<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection>。
